channel.title: Should I do a Logo Change?
channel.description:
I've been thinking a lot lately about changing my logo, I figured this would be a good time because I' not a well-known artist yet. What are your thoughts/suggestions?
I'd really appreciate it, thanks!

spoiler

item.source: Should I do a Logo Change?

item.title: Should I do a Logo Change?
item.dc:creator: paroxyzm
item.description:
In my opinion, it looks more like an artistic design rather than a logo. If that’s what you like then that’s great, go for it, but if you want an actual prominent logo, then I would suggest taking those ideas and what each part represents and try to make a simple logo that has the same effect as what you currently have. And I totally agree with @iammane

Read full topic
item.source: Should I do a Logo Change?

item.title: Should I do a Logo Change?
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Yeah I mean, it’s really well thought out, I like the color palette. It all fits nicely, just my two cents… I’d say ultimately it’s up to you, never let other people dictate your branding.

Read full topic
item.source: Should I do a Logo Change?

item.title: Should I do a Logo Change?
item.dc:creator: Fuujiya
item.description:
Wow there’s a lot depth & meaning when comes to your logo I see…
I really like what kind of look it has going for really…but that’s just my opinion

Read full topic
item.source: Should I do a Logo Change?

item.title: Should I do a Logo Change?
item.dc:creator: Katki
item.description:
Yeah. sure. The girl’s silhouette was mostly just to let people know that I’m a female producer, (although many people still assume I’m a guy)
The broken heart represents the entire meaning of Katki which is being broken but putting yourself back together. The flames on the bottom (aren’t that visible) but it symbolizes rising from flames like a phoneix. And purple is just the color I imagine when I think of Katki.

Read full topic
item.source: Should I do a Logo Change?

I think the logo is pretty dope. Can you tell me what it represents?
